segments.text: Good morning , Madam . What can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like to withdraw 35,000 RIB from my Corporate Account .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , my name is Ms Jane Reeve , R-E-E-V-E .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , yes , Ms Reeve . I have all of your information here . Do you have the cash cheque ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry Ms Reeve , it says 45,000 RIB here .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , how silly of me . Can we correct it here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , we cannot make corrections on these . You'll have to bring another one with the correct amount , I'm afraid .
segments.speaker: S1
